about_the_game:
With the advances in science, the human race has become oblivious to the consequences of their creations. After an unfortunate result of the large hadron collider experiment our reality is torn open and other parallel dimensions are bleeding in. The Perdition Man instructs the protagonist to close these schisms and endure the horrors that lay within certain dark realms that threaten everything. In this first person shooter you will fight frightening monsters that live on the other side that intend to turn base reality into hell. With a retro style and simple, responsive, and fast paced mechanics, The Perdition Man: Winds of Judgment offers players a tense, action pact adventure into nightmarish levels that are equal part disturbing and exciting.

Lost and disillusioned after his stint in the military, Jason makes contact with The Perdition Man who claims to know him, however in this timeline, The Perdition Man never existed and your world is as doomed as a result of the experiment. Everything you've known will be gone soon and this is your only time to make a difference. Be the hero you were supposed to be, and fight with him to save the world!

content_descriptors.notes: There are violent and disturbing images in this game.

short_description: The Perdition Man is back! Having completed part of his mission he now needs a former teammate to do his part. In this action horror first person shooter you have to shoot your way back to your realm. Engaging bosses, multiple themed levels and a handful of guns you need to stabilize our reality.
